ipi-network-instance:network-instances.description: Top level container for network instances

network-instance.description: List of Network instances configured on the local system

instance-name.description: Network Instance Name. For VRF and MAC VRF, instance name can be up to 32 chars long. For VPWS and VPLS instances, instance name can be up to 128 chars long. For L2NI (bridge) instance, instance name has to be a number between (1-32). For Cross-Connect, instance name can be up to 30 chars long. For Bridge-domain, instance, instance name has to be a number between (1-2147483647).

Network Instance Name. For VRF and MAC VRF, instance name can be up to 32 chars long. For VPWS and VPLS instances, instance name can be up to 128 chars long. For L2NI (bridge) instance, instance name has to be a number between (1-32). For Cross-Connect, instance name can be up to 30 chars long. For Bridge-domain, instance, instance name has to be a number between (1-2147483647)

For L2NI (bridge) instance, instance name has to be a number between (1-32). For Cross-Connect, instance name can be up to 30 chars long. For Bridge-domain, instance, instance name has to be a number between (1-2147483647)

ipi-l2vpn-vpws:vpws-instance.description: Top level container for vpws instance

pseudowire-identifier.description: Use this attribute to assign pseudowire identifier to create an instance of an MPLS layer 2 virtual circuit. A Layer-2 MPLS Virtual Circuit instance may be bound to any interface on the router; however, only one interface may be bound to a Layer-2 circuit at a time.

peer-address.description: Use this attribute to specify pseudowire end peer IP address to create an instance of an MPLS layer 2 virtual circuit

config.description: Top level configuration data for Fec128 pseudowire

vc-admin-status.description: This attribute provides admin-status of pseudowire

up-time.description: This attribute provides time when pseudowire comes to forwarding state

last-change-time.description: This attribute provides time when pseudowire changes its last state

create-time.description: This attribute provides time when pseudowire was created

owner.description: This attribute provides owner name of pseudowire

non-te-mapping-direction.description: This attribute provides mapping direction of pseudowire
